attributes.action: Add Political Studies as a compulsery subject
attributes.additional_details: Many students leave school with the power to vote with little to no knowledge of what there voting for. The subject "Political Studies" intends to educate young people (Key stage 2 and 3) about the major political parties in the UK, ensuring that they make an informed decision when they vote

rejection.details: The Department for Education is responsible for schools in England only.
